mapper.select: select mid, qcategory, qcontent, qdate, qanswer, qadate from qna where mid=#{mid} order by qdate desc

select h.himage as himage,h.hname as hname, h.hstar as hstar, hg.hgmoney as hgmoney, h.haddr as haddr, h.hnum as hnum, h.hspecies as hspecies, (select count(*) from board b where h.hname = b.hname and b.btype1 = '유저조행기') as boardnum from host h, (select distinct hname, min(hgmoney) hgmoney from hostgoods group by hname) hg where h.hname = hg.hname
and htype = '바다'
and htype = '민물'
and h.hname like '%' || '전문' || '%'
and h.hname like '%' || '카페' || '%'
order by boardnum desc
select mbnum, mbtitle, mid, mbcontent, mbtag, mbperson, mblocation, mbimage, to_char(mbstartdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as mbstartdate, mbdate, mbreport from matchingboard

select h.himage as himage, h.hname as hname, h.hstar as hstar, h.hnotice as hnotice, h.htype as htype, h.hservice as hservice, h.haddr as haddr, h.hnum as hnum, h.howner as howner, h.hspecies as hspecies, hg.hgname as hgname, hg.hginfo as hginfo, hg.hgmoney as hgmoney, hg.hgnum as hgnum from host h, hostgoods hg where h.hname = hg.hname and h.hnum = #{hnum}
select hgnum, hname, hgname, hginfo, hgmoney from hostgoods where hgnum = #{hgnum}

select h.himage as himage,h.hname as hname, h.hstar as hstar, hg.hgmoney as hgmoney, h.haddr as haddr, h.hnum as hnum, h.hspecies as hspecies, (select count(*) from board b where h.hname = b.hname and b.btype1 = '유저조행기') as boardnum from host h, (select distinct hname, min(hgmoney) hgmoney from hostgoods group by hname) hg where hgmoney between #{minprice} and #{maxprice} and h.hname = hg.hname
and htype = '바다'
and htype = '민물'
and h.hname like '%' || '전문' || '%'
and h.hname like '%' || '카페' || '%'
and h.hname like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
and h.haddr like '%' || #{searchLocation} || '%'
and h.hstar = #{starnum}
order by boardnum desc
select rmtype, rmcount, rmlocation, rmage, rmtime,rmsex,rmstatus from randommatching where rmstatus = 0
select count(rmid) from randommatching where rmstatus = 0 and rmid = #{mid}
select rmnum,rmid,rmtype,rmcount,rmlocation,rmage,rmtime,rmsex from randommatching where rmstatus = 0 and rmid = #{mid}
select mrnum as rmnum,mrresult,mrtype as rmtype,mrcount as rmcount,mrlocation as rmlocation,mrage as rmage,mrtime as rmtime,mrsex as rmsex from matchingresult where mrresult like '%' || #{mid} || '%'

select mbnum,mbtitle,mid,mbcontent,mbtag,mbperson,mblocation,mbimage,to_date(mbstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as mbstartdate ,to_date(mbdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as mbdate,mbreport from matchingboard where to_date(mbstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') > to_date(#{dto.startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(mbstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_date(#{dto.enddate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and
mbtag LIKE '%'|| #{item}|| '%'

select mbnum,mbtitle,mid,mbcontent,mbtag,mbperson,mblocation,mbimage,to_date(mbstartdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as mbstartdate ,to_date(mbdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') as mbdate,mbreport,mbstatus,mbresult from matchingboard where mbnum = #{mbnum}
select mbperson,mbstatus from matchingboard where mbnum = #{mbnum}
mapper.update: update matchingboard set mbstatus = mbstatus + 1 , mbresult = mbresult || #{mid} || '/' where mbnum = #{mbnum}
mapper.select: select count(mbtitle) from matchingboard where mbnum = #{mbnum} and mbresult LIKE '%'|| #{mid} || '%'
